commands.T24: Inserts a T24 PDF form and automatically adds embedded text and images on the final page.
commands.PDFSHEETS: Inserts all pages of a selected multi-page PDF as underlays in a grid layout.
commands.PNGSHEETS: Inserts all PNG pages from a selected folder into paper space in a grid layout.
commands.TXTSUMEXPORT: Extracts room types and square footage from selected text objects and exports the combined data to a JSON file.
commands.TXTSUM: Sums numerical values from selected text objects, handling various formats including VA ratings.
commands.AREALABEL: Calculates areas of selected polylines and adds text labels with the area in square feet at the center of each.
commands.TABLEANALYZE: Captures a selected AutoCAD table at full fidelity and exports a reconstruction-ready JSON file.
commands.LIGHTINGFIXTURESCHEDULE: Inserts a built-in lighting fixture schedule AutoCAD table template at a picked insertion point and applies local sync data when available.
commands.LFSPULL: Exports selected lighting fixture schedule table data to T24LightingFixtureSchedule.sync.json in the active DWG folder.
commands.LFSPUSH: Loads T24LightingFixtureSchedule.sync.json from the active DWG folder and applies it to a selected lighting fixture schedule table.
